summary: WHEN APPLYING BRAKES VEHICLE PULLS SHARPLY TO THE LEFT. WAS IN 6 TIMES FOR REPAIR. THEY COULDN'T FIX IT AND EXPECTED ME TO PAY FOR THEIR EXPERIMENTS TO TRY TO FIX IT. THE CHRYSLER REP TRIED TO GET OUT OF PAYING UNDER WARRANTY. FINALLY FIXED. HAVE DRIVEN TRUCK ABOUT 1200 MILES NOW AND STARTING TO PULL AGAIN! BRAKES LOCK-UP IN A STERN ATTEMPT TO STOP. ANTI-LOCK BRAKES ARE A JOKE.   *NLM
